amendment.description: Amendment sought to add an exception to the bill for rules that the Administrator of the Office of Management and Budget determines would result in net job growth.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 114-230 to add an exception to the bill for rules that the Administrator of the Office of Management and Budget determines would result in net job growth.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 246 (Roll no. 475).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 246 (Roll no. 475).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
